data.title: Republicans in Congress are refusing to continue Trump-Russia investigation, won't name new witnesses in probe

Republicans accused of concocting email scandal against Robert Mueller: Claim that investigators wrongfully obtained emails of president’s transition team are dismissed as ‘baloney’ and a ploy to discredit Trump-Russia inquiry.
Russia investigation: Robert Mueller 'has obtained tens of thousands of Trump transition team emails'
Asiatic cheetahs on the brink of extinction with only 50 left alive - With UN funds being cut this month, conservationists call for last-ditch effort to save animal which clings on only in Iran
Putin thanks Trump for CIA data that helped prevent terror attack in St. Petersburg

'I live like a plant': Nobel winner's wife 'going mad' under Chinese detention - Liu Xia, poet and widow of democracy advocate Liu Xiaobo, suffering deep depression after living under house arrest without charges since 2010

Brazilian police foil million-dollar fraud to export precious wood to China: Two Chinese entrepreneurs paid millions of dollars to a Brazilian company that bribed environment officials of an Amazon state to illegally export precious hardwoods to China.

A Taiwanese steel firm behind a toxic spill that killed tonnes of fish in central Vietnam last year was fined for a second time for illegally burying "harmful" waste. The $11 billion steel plant in Ha Tinh province sparked one of the country's worst environmental catastrophes
Ontario offers $75,000 as rebate for the purchase of Tesla Semi
Saudi Jet Fighters Attack Wedding in Yemen, Kill 10 Women
